hovertext: Clive Lewis
Income Categories
Employment

1 June 2017, received from Bragg Central Limited, PO Box 6830, Bridport DT6 9
BH, three tickets (value £238 each; £714 in total) for the Glastonbury Festival from 23 to 25 June 2017, in return for giving a speech. I gave one ticket to a community group. Hours: 8 hrs. (Registered 21 August 2017)

26 June 2017, received £500 from That Lot Creatives, Headspace, 19-21 Hatton Garden London EC1
N 8
BA, for appearing on a radio programme on 20 June 2017. Hours: 6 hrs. (Registered 22 August 2017)
